verify_cmd: rg -n "default_version|official_version|beta_release_version|beta_releaseA_version|validUpdateToVariants|updateToVariantLabel|saveUpdateToVariant|CupertinoActionSheet" lib/core/models/app_settings.dart lib/features/settings/views/other_settings_view.dart lib/core/services/settings_service.dart && dart format --output=none --set-exit-if-changed lib/core/models/app_settings.dart lib/features/settings/views/other_settings_view.dart
